parameters.name: AclEntryComment
parameters.description: The remarks of the ACL entry.

parameters.name: AclId
parameters.description: The ID of the ACL that you want to query.

parameters.name: Page
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Maximum value: **50**. Default value: **10**.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the ACL.

You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~2401682~~) operation to query the most recent region list.
